content: I ate some duros, also known as mexican wheels, while reading about my favorite dinaosaurs today. Unfortunately, the book did not include Ichthyosaurus, but Talarurus also seems really cool. It was nice. I also got the answer that I now have a job this summer. But as you know I won't tell you what company it is. Feel free to try to figure it out!
pictures: A picture of the dinosaur Ichthyosaurus.

content: I never told you, but my favorite dinosaurs are Aardonyx, Datanglong and Ichthyosaurus.
Man, this latest course of mine, LMA017, was so fun. Way too little math for my taste though.
